nodes.text: Little Gut was the trained Rancor of Ronum Minkus, a participant in the Arena Grand of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Little Gut was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger" and was defeated in the eighth round of the Arena fights.
Little Gut appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the eighth boss of the "Eternal Championship."
